comment.author: 37377809@N00
comment._content: metadata slightly wrong on this one... it's Public School 75, Evergreen Avenue, Brooklyn.  with that info, I was able to track it down on Street View to the intersection of Evergreen Ave and Grove St. The school address is 95 Grove St.

comment._content: On June 22, 2011, jonvoss suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!

comment._content: Wow! My old elementary school (over 100 years ago). Went there from the 1st grade to 5th- Class of 1986 (5-2 BL).
